title: Fouzia Farooq
text: I am an Assistant Research Professor in the [Department of Global Health](https://publichealth.gwu.edu/departments/global-health/gw) at the [Milken Institute School of Public Health](https://publichealth.gwu.edu) at [The George Washington University (GW)](https://www.gwu.edu). I am interested in maternal and child health and infectious diseases. I received my BS in Biology in 2007 and a Masters in Public Health in 2015 from [George Mason University](https://www.gmu.edu/) and a PhD from [University of Pittsburgh - School of Public Health](https://www.sph.pitt.edu/epidemiology) in 2022. I completed my postdoctoral research in the Department of Global Health at GW in 2023. Prior to starting my PhD work I worked as a bench scientist at [Water Reed Army Institute of Research/Naval Medical Research Center](https://wrair.health.mil/) in Silver Spring, MD.
